sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Willem and Martyn are the twin sons of Ser [[Kevan Lannister]], and younger brothers of [[Lancel Lannister]]. He and his cousin Tion Frey - son of Genna Lannister and Emmon Frey - are captured at the [[Battle of the Whispering Wood]]. Later, Willem and TionÂ are killed by Rickard Karstark.
